评论详情: flattering and if you’re going for something not too revealing on the bottom half of you this is nice!!

Super pretty, and rare/hard to find anywhere. It came in good quality, I didn’t have any issues with the sizing (altho it would likely fit people wit smaller boobs better!), and it looked just as it did in the pic!
